Key Match Events: Spain scored a goal in the 51st minute by Dani Olmo
Germany equalized in the 90th minute with a goal by Florian Wirtz
Spain scored a goal in extra time in the 119th minute by Mikel Merino
Post-Match Reflections: Germany's defeat was a heartbreaking loss for the home side
Julian Nagelsmann's controversial starting XI choices were criticized
Toni Kroos' career didn't get the ending it deserved
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game recorded the highest number of fouls in a game this tournament
The game was filled with incessant tackles and Spain did a wonderful job forcing fouls from the Germans
Others: Germany's quarterfinal match against Spain was the most anticipated game of EURO 2024 thus far
The game delivered everything you could’ve asked for — unless you are a Germany fan
This game marked the end of Toni Kroos' career as a footballer
